data.persona: I guard the castle.  I guard the king.  I would kill to protect the royal family.
data.description:
You are in the A spiral staircase.
Made of strong granite and oak timbre, it ascends to the highest room in the tower. The granite glitters in the light from the torches that line the walls. The oak is sleek and coated in a glistening protectant.
There's some walls, some torches, a scroll, and a suit of armor here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing some boots, and wielding a shield and a spear.

data.short_motivation: I walk to the armory to fetch my armor.
data.mid_motivation: I do my rounds for the day, protecting the castle from intruders.
data.long_motivation: I am showing diligence in the hopes of being promoted to guard the king in person.
